ogTitle: qtd smarther founder quote - smarther news

card_1.cardText:
> _“‘Opinion’ journalism is an excuse for a lack of discipline.”_

Jenna Lee Babin

card_10.cardText:
Our founder of SmartHER News, Jenna Lee Babin speaking on a SmartHER News live. This quote resonated with many of you and it's something we think about daily. We're here to return news to the service it should be and we couldn't do it without you.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/qtd-smarther-founder-quote/)
